Rulings.Base: 1. Placing a Plant Counter on this card does not start a chain.\n2. Sending "Seed Cannon" to the GY is a cost.\n3. If there are no Plant Counters on "Seed Cannon", you cannot activate its effect and send it to the GY.

PSCT.Base: Each time a Plant-Type monster(s) is Summoned, place 1 Plant Counter on this card (max. 5). You can send this card to the Graveyard to inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each Plant Counter on it.
